name: RelicHunter
description:
In RelicHunter you play as an archaeologist who is always on the hunt for new relics and other treasures. This time visiting dangerous caves all around the world in which he can find treasures of the Roman, Mayan and Egyptian cultures.

Can you find all of the treasures and make it out alive. 

Features:

  • Explore 5 different caves
  • Find relics and treasures 
  • Solve puzzles
  • Controller support
  • Full save system

Controls:

WalkA,DD-Pad/XRunLeft ShiftRight ShoulderJumpSpaceButton WestJump higherHold SpaceHold Button WestCrouchCButton EastFlashlightFButton NorthPeekW,S
D-Pad/YInteractEButton SouthPauseESCStart
